select gxky0312.id as id, gxky0312.zzmc as nickname, department.title as department, gxky0312.lwbh as lwbh, gxky0316.lwmc as title, gxky0316.fbqk, dm_paper_type.NAME as type, ( case gxky0312.smsx when 1 then rule.score1 when 2 then rule.score2 when 3 then rule.score3 when 4 then rule.score4 when 5 then rule.score5 when 6 then rule.score6 when 7 then rule.score7 when 8 then rule.score8 end ) as score
from gxky0312 join gxky0316 on gxky0312.lwbh = gxky0316.id join gxjg0101 on gxjg0101.gh = gxky0312.zzzgh join department on department.id = gxjg0101.dwh left join dm_paper_type on gxky0316.lwfl = dm_paper_type.id left join paper_rule rule on rule.department = gxjg0101.dwh and rule.year = #{year} and gxky0316.lwfl = rule.type
gxky0316.shzt = 2 and department.title like concat('%', #{department}, '%') and gxjg0101.dwh = #{departmentId} and gxjg0101.xm like concat('%', #{nickname}, '%') and gxjg0101.gh like concat('%', #{account}, '%') and year(gxky0316.fbrq) = #{year}
order by gxky0312.id
SELECT DISTINCT gxjg0101.xm as nickname, gxjg0101.gh as account FROM gxky0312 join gxjg0101 on gxjg0101.gh = gxky0312.zzzgh where gxky0312.lwbh = #{id} order by gxky0312.smsx

select sum(( case gxky0312.smsx when 1 then rule.score1 when 2 then rule.score2 when 3 then rule.score3 when 4 then rule.score4 when 5 then rule.score5 when 6 then rule.score6 when 7 then rule.score7 when 8 then rule.score8 end )) from gxky0312 join gxky0316 on gxky0312.lwbh = gxky0316.id join gxjg0101 on gxjg0101.gh = gxky0312.zzzgh left join paper_rule rule on rule.department = gxjg0101.dwh and rule.year = #{year} and gxky0316.lwfl = rule.type
gxky0316.shzt = 2 and gxky0312.zzzgh = #{account} and year(gxky0316.fbrq) = #{year}
